video.title: The Good Place
video.synopsis: Due to an error, self-absorbed Eleanor Shellstrop arrives at the Good Place after her death. Determined to stay, she tries to become a better person.

episodes.synopsis: When Eleanor dies and winds up in an afterlife paradise reserved for only the most ethical people, she realizes she's been mistaken for somebody else.
episodes.title: Everything Is Fine

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor wants Chidi to teach her to be a good person, so he insists that she participate in a neighborhood cleanup instead of learning to fly.
episodes.title: Flying

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor thinks Tahani knows her secret. Michael tries to get Chidi interested in a new hobby. Janet goes through some strange personality changes.
episodes.title: Tahani Al-Jamil

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor becomes friends with another neighborhood resident who's hiding something. Tahani plans a gala for the opening of a new restaurant.
episodes.title: Jason Mendoza

episodes.synopsis: Chidi tires of spending so much time teaching Eleanor. Tahani snoops and doesn't like what she finds. Michael quarantines the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor distracts Michael from his search for the design flaw that's disrupting the neighborhood. Chidi horns in on Tahani and Jianyu's spa date.
episodes.title: What We Owe to Each Other

episodes.synopsis: After learning Michael's retirement will be an eternity of torture, Eleanor decides to deactivate Janet, the only one able to send Michael away.
episodes.title: The Eternal Shriek

episodes.synopsis: Trying to uncover the truth, Michael interrogates Eleanor about her life, and also interviews Chidi, Tahani and Jianyu. Chidi faces a moral dilemma.
episodes.title: Most Improved Player

episodes.synopsis: Michael has difficulty negotiating for Eleanor's fate. The Bad Place demons misbehave at Tahani's house. Chidi bonds with the other Eleanor.
episodes.title: ...Someone Like Me as a Member

episodes.synopsis: Michael is frustrated by Chidi's indecisiveness. Eleanor discovers feelings she didn't realize she had. Jianyu makes a surprising announcement.
episodes.title: Chidi's Choice

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor tries to improve her score before the judge arrives. Michael makes a surprising discovery. Chidi asks Eleanor for advice about love.
episodes.title: What's My Motivation

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor flees to the Medium Place with Jason and Janet, where they meet a former lawyer who lives there alone. Meanwhile, Eleanor's trial proceeds.
episodes.title: Mindy St. Claire

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor, Jason, Chidi and Tahani argue about which two of them should go to the Bad Place. Eleanor has a shocking realization about the Good Place.
episodes.title: Michael's Gambit

episodes.synopsis: With their memories erased, Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason start their Good Place experience all over again. Eleanor tries to understand her clue.
episodes.title: Everything Is Great!

episodes.synopsis: As issues continue to arise, Michael keeps trying to make his elaborate plan for the Good Place work. Eleanor makes a surprising discovery.
episodes.title: Dance Dance Resolution

episodes.synopsis: As Michael tries to put a new plan in place, Eleanor and the gang must make an important decision. Tahani learns a shocking truth about herself.
episodes.title: Team Cockroach

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor tries to help Michael through a crisis. Tahani is determined to throw her most impressive dinner party yet, but things go awry.
episodes.title: Existential Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Chidi is frustrated by Michael's inability to understand the principles of human ethics. Tahani confides in Janet.
episodes.title: The Trolley Problem

episodes.synopsis: Michael works with Janet to try to get to the bottom of her recent glitches -- which could cause the entire neighborhood to collapse.
episodes.title: Janet and Michael

episodes.synopsis: Michael turns to Eleanor and Chidi for help with solving a tricky problem created by Janet. Jason surprises Tahani with an unexpected idea.
episodes.title: Derek

episodes.synopsis: When Michael's boss arrives and makes an announcement, loyalties may be shifting. Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason must decide on their next move.
episodes.title: Leap to Faith

episodes.synopsis: Michael experiences some unexpected emotions. After a disappointing setback, Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason open up to each other.
episodes.title: Best Self

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to save themselves, the gang goes on an adventure to a new realm in disguise -- but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: Rhonda, Diana, Jake, and Trent

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason try to prove they've become better people. Michael must face the consequences of his actions.
episodes.title: The Burrito

episodes.synopsis: Janet and Chidi reveal some unexpressed emotions. Michael pushes for a new kind of experiment.
episodes.title: Somewhere Else

episodes.synopsis: Back on Earth with their memories wiped, Eleanor and Chidi connect after having near-death experiences. Michael bends the rules of the new experiment.
episodes.title: Everything is Bonzer

episodes.synopsis: After the arrival of the new subject in the near-death study, the group begins to fall apart. Michael and Janet attempt to keep the gang together.
episodes.title: The Brainy Bunch

episodes.synopsis: As the group continues to study ethical thought, Michael and Janet, now in Australia, intervene in their lives in numerous ways.
episodes.title: The Snowplow

episodes.synopsis: After Michael and Janet reveal some truths to Eleanor and the rest of the group, they split up as they try to come to grips with what they've learned.
episodes.title: Jeremy Bearimy

episodes.synopsis: While Michael, Jason and Tahani try to do a good deed in Jacksonville, Janet and Eleanor help Chidi solve a difficult problem.
episodes.title: The Ballad of Donkey Doug

episodes.synopsis: After learning some shocking news, Eleanor goes to Nevada with Michael to investigate. Tahani tries to make amends, with a little help from Chidi.
episodes.title: A Fractured Inheritance

episodes.synopsis: When Eleanor asks Michael to help her recall some of her forgotten afterlife memories, she begins to gain insight into her motivations.
episodes.title: The Worst Possible Use of Free Will

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Janet visit someone significant and are surprised by what they learn. Eleanor considers whether to share a secret with Chidi.
episodes.title: Don't Let the Good Life Pass You By

episodes.synopsis: While Michael and Janet go on a quest to help the four humans, Eleanor and Chidi have a philosophical disagreement about their relationship.
episodes.title: Janet(s)

episodes.synopsis: Michael hits a wall in his quest to resolve a big problem. As Jason struggles with complicated feelings, Chidi tries to cheer Eleanor up.
episodes.title: The Book of Dougs

episodes.synopsis: The humans tag along with Michael to a crucial meeting at the Interdimensional Hole of Pancakes. Janet reconnects with someone from her past.
episodes.title: Chidi Sees the Time-Knife

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor steps in to help when Michael panics. Tahani faces a new kind of torment. Eleanor and Chidi come to an unexpected crossroads.
episodes.title: Pandemonium

episodes.synopsis: As humans arrive in the new neighborhood, Michael and the group try to understand what makes them tick. Eleanor and Jason both deal with jealousy.
episodes.title: A Girl From Arizona - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor and Michael pull out all the stops to try to help Brent become a better person. Tahani and Janet have concerns about Eleanor's leadership.
episodes.title: A Girl From Arizona - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Chidi's too relaxed, so Eleanor and Michael create tension in his life to force him to become a better person. Tahani invites John to a spa day.
episodes.title: Chillaxing

episodes.synopsis: As the group deals with a frustrating lack of progress, a visitor arrives and makes a shocking claim that causes them to question who can be trusted.
episodes.title: Tinker, Tailor, Demon, Spy

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Jason sneak into Demon-Con. Left in charge of the neighborhood, Eleanor copes with Derek's ineptitude and Tahani's dissatisfaction.
episodes.title: Employee of the Bearimy

episodes.synopsis: After Brent writes an offensive book, Eleanor, Michael and the others try to help him evolve. One of the humans discovers Jason's true identity.
episodes.title: A Chip Driver Mystery

episodes.synopsis: With one day left in the year, Simone reveals that she's suspicious about the neighborhood -- and her investigation could derail the entire experiment.
episodes.title: Help is Other People

episodes.synopsis: As the Judge hears Michael and Shawn's arguments about the results of the experiment, Janet and the humans give each other the funerals they deserved.
episodes.title: The Funerals To End All Funerals

episodes.synopsis: With time running out to find answers, Chidi must sort through his life -- and afterlives -- before he can provide the help everyone needs.
episodes.title: The Answer

episodes.synopsis: The group scrambles to devise a new afterlife system that the Good and Bad Places can agree on before it's too late. Chidi has a newfound confidence.
episodes.title: You've Changed, Man

episodes.synopsis: While the humans search for test candidates, Michael trains a group of architects. Eleanor doesn't want Chidi to learn too much about her past.
episodes.title: Mondays, Am I Right?

episodes.synopsis: Arriving at a new place, Michael receives an unexpected honor. Meanwhile, the rest of the group explores — and learns a shocking truth.
episodes.title: Patty

episodes.synopsis: Michael works with the Joint Council of Afterlife Affairs to smooth out kinks in the system. Jason and Tahani move on. Eleanor tries to influence Chidi.
episodes.title: Whenever You're Ready
